name: Aliens Dig My Mixtape
description:
"Oh, look, aliens."

"Hey, they dig my mixtape. Yo, come join the party!"

"What? No you can't have it, it's mine. Hey, leave me alone!"

Synopsis

In "Aliens Dig My Mixtape" you play as an interstellar traveler, who's being attacked by aliens who want to steal your mixtape.

You worked really hard on making it and don't want them to have it.

Luckily they dislike the sound of the tape being rewound, use it to your advantage!

 Controls

  • WASD/Arrow Keys to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left Mouse Click to shoot
  • Right Mouse Click to rewind the tape

Credits

Everything done and made by myself with the exception of the spaceship models which were done by my brother Ivan Cvetkovic, the cassette tape model which was done by Anderson Ferreira (downloaded freely from Sketchfab) and the font which was done by Cile (downloaded freely from 1001 Fonts).
